Text: Looks like TPB converts quotation symbols in the torrent's description to garbled text, and I can't edit the torrent to fix it. Hmm.

policji, I uploaded it because a) some people can't get it through the launcher due to network issues, b) others don't want EA to obtain their IP addresses by allowing the launcher to touch home when it downloads the patch and, finally, c) because I fucking can.
